SEARCH
Package eclipproj

Class Bill

java.lang.Object
eclipproj.Bill
public class Bill extends Object
This class represents a bill with a title, description, proposer, date introduced, and a status indicating its current state.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Bill.BillStatus
    Enum representing the possible statuses of a bill.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bill

      public Bill(String title, String description, String proposer, String dateIntroduced, Bill.BillStatus status)
      Constructs a Bill object with the specified title, description, proposer, date introduced, and status.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the bill.
      description - A brief description of the bill.
      proposer - The name of the person or entity proposing the bill.
      dateIntroduced - The date the bill was introduced.
      status - The current status of the bill (e.g., proposed, passed, rejected).
